events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering roles as a Software Developer candidate.
A recruiter specializing in technical roles has been assigned to manage your application process.
The initial screening call went well; the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge of backend systems.
The candidate responded promptly and enthusiastically confirmed availability for the technical interview.
Technical interview has been scheduled for April 15th at 10 AM to assess software development skills.
Candidate completed the technical interview demonstrating excellent problem-solving and coding skills.
HR interview has been scheduled for April 18th to discuss company culture and compensation details.
HR interview completed successfully; candidate fits well with team values and expectations.
An official offer has been proposed to the candidate including salary package and benefits.
Candidate responded positively to the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining the team.
The candidate officially accepted the job offer and commitment to start soon was confirmed.
The onboarding process has started smoothly with all necessary documentation and training scheduled.
Hire process successfully closed; candidate has joined the company and begun working as a developer.
